item.title: BIOS update on Thinkpad 600E
item.description: Plugged my IBM usb floppy drive into the 600E and ran the spsdin36.exe E: to write the files into the diskette. Next step was to make an image from this diskette and make it a bootable CD so I could boot into my 600E. Plugged the usb floppy into my main desktop running linux and did a couple of commands to make an image from the floppy and convert it into an iso cd image.

item.title: Compiling coreboot + tianocore for my thinkpad x220
item.description: Recently I flashed coreboot + tianocore into my thinkpad x220 and I was having some issues to compile it on my Fedora 32.
